text:
Adobe has released 18 thousand new fonts for iPhone
01 Nov 2019, 21:59 by Ilya Sidorov
Adobe has added 1,300 free fonts to Creative Cloud.
They can be used in all applications on iOS 13.1 and iPadOS 13.1 that support the corresponding function, for example, in Pages.
Earlier installation of custom fonts was a very difficult process. Starting with iOS 13.1, Apple has simplified this process by providing APIs to developers.
Adobe Creative Cloud has the following font types:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Sans serif Ô∏è Sans-serif Ô∏è Handwritten‚ñ™ —Å–∫ Bar-shaped Ô∏è Gothic Ô∏è Monospaced
A Creative Cloud subscription gives you access to 17,000 more fonts. [The Verge]
